edu.OOSE.cs.jhu.group2.PopZombiesUI

Interface Music


  • public interface Music
    The Music class that represents one piece of background music. Created with refence to http://www.kilobolt.com/game-development-tutorial.html
    Author:
    kilobolt, Connie Chang, Elaine Chao, Stephanie Chew, Ted Stanley, Kevin Zhang

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dispose()
      Deletes the music.
      boolean isLooping()
      Returns whether the music is looping.
      boolean isPlaying()
      Returns whether the music is playing.
      boolean isStopped()
      Returns whether the music is not playing.
      void pause()
      Pauses the music.
      void play()
      Starts playing the music.
      void seekBegin()
      Gets the beginning of the music file.
      void setLooping(boolean looping)
      Sets whether Music loops.
      void setVolume(float volume)
      Sets the volume of the music.
      void stop()
      Stops playing the music.

    • Method Detail

      • play

        void play()
        Starts playing the music.

      • stop

        void stop()
        Stops playing the music.

      • pause

        void pause()
        Pauses the music.

      • setLooping

        void setLooping(boolean looping)
        Sets whether Music loops.
        Parameters:
        looping - Whether the music loops

      • setVolume

        void setVolume(float volume)
        Sets the volume of the music.
        Parameters:
        volume - The new volume

      • isPlaying

        boolean isPlaying()
        Returns whether the music is playing.
        Returns:
        True if playing, false if not.

      • isStopped

        boolean isStopped()
        Returns whether the music is not playing.
        Returns:
        True if not playing, otherwise false

      • isLooping

        boolean isLooping()
        Returns whether the music is looping.
        Returns:
        True if looping, otherwise false

      • dispose

        void dispose()
        Deletes the music.

      • seekBegin

        void seekBegin()
        Gets the beginning of the music file.
